In the early stage of COVID‐19, the total number of peripheral blood leucocytes was normal or decreased and the lymphocyte count was decreased. In some patients, liver enzyme, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), muscle enzyme, aspartate transaminase level and myoglobin were increased.
53 The numbers of helper T cells, suppressor T cells and regulatory T cells were significantly reduced in patients of severe COVID‐19, whereas the percentage of naïve T cells increased.
